!Newbie Guide: May Shilen cloak your footsteps! I am the greatest Assassin ever to ply my trade for the golry of our mother Shilen. Now I am retired, and I teach my art to novice Dark Elves here in the town where I was born. If you are in need of advice, please ask. I will give you what guidence I can.
